name: simple-autoricing-i3wm-dotfiles
description: I3 Window Ricing + Widget Panel using EWW
readme_summary: This repository provides a minimalist i3 Window Manager setup with automated theming based on wallpapers using Material 3 color palettes. It includes a complete configuration for essential tools like Eww, Alacritty, Fish, and Rofi, all integrated and themed for a cohesive desktop experience.
key_features: Complete setup with i3wm, Eww, Alacritty, Fish, Rofi, Dunst
primary_use_case: To provide users with a highly customizable, aesthetically pleasing, and resource-efficient i3 Window Manager environment that automatically adapts its color scheme to match their chosen wallpaper.
cover_image_prompt: A digital artist's studio where a single, vibrant wallpaper is placed on an easel. From the wallpaper, streams of colorful light flow into a magical prism labeled 'm3wal'. The prism refracts these colors, casting dynamic, Material 3-inspired palettes onto a minimalist i3 window manager setup displayed on a nearby monitor. The monitor shows a clean desktop with themed widgets and applications, all harmonizing with the generated colors. Subtle digital particles and glowing UI elements connect the scene to software. The overall mood is creative and efficient, with a clean, focused composition. Style: 3D isometric illustration with soft lighting and a vibrant color palette.

name: MentraOS
description: MentraOS is the leading smart glasses platform + SDK. Stream your view, transcribe audio, talk to AI and capture photos hands-free on compatible glasses.
readme_summary: MentraOS is an open-source operating system and SDK for smart glasses, enabling hands-free interaction with AI, streaming, transcription, and photo capture on compatible devices. It supports a range of smart glasses and offers a developer console and app store for extending functionality.
key_features: Open source OS for smart glasses
primary_use_case: To provide a comprehensive platform and SDK for developing and running applications on smart glasses, enabling intuitive, hands-free user experiences.
cover_image_prompt: A person wearing sleek, futuristic smart glasses, with their hands in their pockets, looking at a vibrant, holographic interface projected in front of them. The interface displays a live stream of their view, a transcription of ambient sounds, and a friendly AI assistant icon. Subtle digital particles flow from the glasses, representing data and commands. The background is a clean, modern environment, emphasizing focus on the user's augmented reality experience. The MentraOS logo is subtly integrated into the holographic display. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with bright, clean lighting and a futuristic color palette.

name: marktext
description: Modern, minimalist markdown editor for Mac with live preview
readme_summary: MarkText is a free, open-source, and minimalist markdown editor focused on speed and usability. It offers a distraction-free writing experience with a real-time, in-line WYSIWYG preview and support for CommonMark and GitHub Flavored Markdown specifications. This fork aims to modernize the editor for contemporary macOS, Windows, and Linux systems.
key_features: Realtime preview (WYSIWYG) and a clean and simple interface
In-line in-editor preview (not a split pane preview)
File-first approach (no vaults or cloud services)
primary_use_case: Writing and editing markdown documents with a live, in-line preview for a distraction-free experience.
cover_image_prompt: A minimalist, elegant desk in a serene, sunlit room. On the desk, a single, pristine sheet of paper is transforming in real-time into a beautifully formatted markdown document, complete with clear headings, lists, and code blocks, as if by magic. A subtle, glowing cursor hovers over the paper, indicating the point of creation. The surrounding environment is clean and uncluttered, emphasizing focus and simplicity. Small, ethereal digital particles representing text flow from an unseen source onto the paper. The overall mood is calm and productive. The style should be a 3D isometric illustration with soft lighting and a clean, modern aesthetic, featuring the name 'MarkText' subtly integrated into a small, elegant UI element on the desk.

name: Text-Grab
description: Use OCR in Windows quickly and easily with Text Grab. With optional background process and notifications.
readme_summary: Text Grab is a C# Windows utility that uses Optical Character Recognition (OCR) to extract text from any visible content on the screen. It leverages the Windows API for local OCR processing, allowing users to copy text from images, videos, or application elements that don't support text selection. The application offers multiple modes for flexible text grabbing.
key_features: Extracts text from screenshots of any visible content
Local OCR processing using Windows API
Clipboard integration for easy text copying
primary_use_case: Quickly and easily copying text from any visible content on a Windows screen, even if the text is part of an image or application element.
cover_image_prompt: A digital hand reaching out from a computer screen, its fingers gently plucking glowing letters and words from various on-screen elements like images, videos, and application windows. These plucked words are then neatly organized and placed into a digital clipboard. The background is a stylized representation of a Windows desktop, with subtle UI elements and the 'Text Grab' logo integrated into the scene. The overall mood is one of effortless extraction and utility, with a clean, modern aesthetic. The art style should be a 3D isometric illustration with vibrant, glowing text elements and a soft, diffused lighting.
